body_html:
I think I'm seeing something similar. Haven't been able to confirm that it's a memory leak, but progress grinds to a halt (session.run never returns) after a few iterations of training and memory usage is quite high. I'm also making use of queues, and my setup is almost identical to the one above.

Edit: I should mention that I'm training on a GPU (Titan X).

body:
I think I'm seeing something similar. Haven't been able to confirm that it's a memory leak, but progress grinds to a halt (`session.run` never returns) after a few iterations of training and memory usage is quite high. I'm also making use of queues, and my setup is almost identical to the one above.

Edit: I should mention that I'm training on a GPU (Titan X).
